name: LAPSUS$
descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) is cyber criminal threat group that has been active since at least mid-2021. [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) specializes in large-scale social engineering and extortion operations, including destructive attacks without the use of ransomware. The group has targeted organizations globally, including in the government, manufacturing, higher education, energy, healthcare, technology, telecommunications, and media sectors.(Citation: BBC LAPSUS Apr 2022)(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)(Citation: UNIT 42 LAPSUS Mar 2022)

technique_table_data.name: Account Access Removal
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has removed a targeted organization's global admin accounts to lock the organization out of all access.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Domain Account
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has used the AD Explorer tool to enumerate users on a victim's network.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)(Citation: NCC Group LAPSUS Apr 2022)

subtechniques.name: Additional Cloud Roles
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has added the global admin role to accounts they have created in the targeted organization's cloud instances.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Virtual Private Server
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has used VPS hosting providers for infrastructure.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Email Accounts
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has payed employees, suppliers, and business partners of target organizations for credentials.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)(Citation: NCC Group LAPSUS Apr 2022)

subtechniques.name: DNS Server
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has reconfigured a victim's DNS records to actor-controlled domains and websites.(Citation: NCC Group LAPSUS Apr 2022)

subtechniques.name: Cloud Account
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has created global admin accounts in the targeted organization's cloud instances to gain persistence.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Credentials from Web Browsers
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has obtained passwords and session tokens with the use of the Redline password stealer.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Password Managers
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has accessed local password managers and databases to obtain further credentials from a compromised network.(Citation: NCC Group LAPSUS Apr 2022)

technique_table_data.name: Data Destruction
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has deleted the target's systems and resources both on-premises and in the cloud.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)(Citation: NCC Group LAPSUS Apr 2022)

subtechniques.name: Confluence
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has searched a victim's network for collaboration platforms like Confluence and JIRA to discover further high-privilege account credentials.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Sharepoint
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has searched a victim's network for collaboration platforms like SharePoint to discover further high-privilege account credentials.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)(Citation: NCC Group LAPSUS Apr 2022)

subtechniques.name: Code Repositories
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has searched a victim's network for code repositories like GitLab and GitHub to discover further high-privilege account credentials.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)(Citation: NCC Group LAPSUS Apr 2022)

subtechniques.name: Messaging Applications
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has searched a victim's network for organization collaboration channels like MS Teams or Slack to discover further high-privilege account credentials.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

technique_table_data.name: Data from Local System
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) uploaded sensitive files, information, and credentials from a targeted organization for extortion or public release.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Email Forwarding Rule
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has set an Office 365 tenant level mail transport rule to send all mail in and out of the targeted organization to the newly created account.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

technique_table_data.name: Exploitation for Privilege Escalation
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has exploited unpatched vulnerabilities on internally accessible servers including JIRA, GitLab, and Confluence for privilege escalation.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

technique_table_data.name: External Remote Services
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has gained access to internet-facing systems and applications, including virtual private network (VPN), remote desktop protocol (RDP), and virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) including Citrix. (Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)(Citation: NCC Group LAPSUS Apr 2022)

technique_table_data.name: Gather Victim Identity Information
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has gathered detailed information of target employees to enhance their social engineering lures.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Credentials
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has gathered user identities and credentials to gain initial access to a victim's organization; the group has also called an organization's help desk to reset a target's credentials.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)(Citation: NCC Group LAPSUS Apr 2022)

subtechniques.name: Email Addresses
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has gathered employee email addresses, including personal accounts, for social engineering and initial access efforts.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Business Relationships
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has gathered detailed knowledge of an organization's supply chain relationships.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Identify Roles
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has gathered detailed knowledge of team structures within a target organization.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

technique_table_data.name: Impersonation
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has called victims' help desk and impersonated legitimate users with previously gathered information in order to gain access to privileged accounts.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Create Cloud Instance
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has created new virtual machines within the target's cloud environment after leveraging credential access to cloud assets.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Delete Cloud Instance
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has deleted the target's systems and resources in the cloud to trigger the organization's incident and crisis response process.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

technique_table_data.name: Multi-Factor Authentication Interception
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has replayed stolen session token and passwords to trigger simple-approval MFA prompts in hope of the legitimate user will grant necessary approval.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

technique_table_data.name: Multi-Factor Authentication Request Generation
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has spammed target users with MFA prompts in the hope that the legitimate user will grant necessary approval.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Malware
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) acquired and used the Redline password stealer in their operations.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Tool
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has obtained tools such as RVTools and AD Explorer for their operations.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)(Citation: NCC Group LAPSUS Apr 2022)

subtechniques.name: NTDS
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has used Windows built-in tool `ntdsutil` to extract the Active Directory (AD) database.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: DCSync
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has used DCSync attacks to gather credentials for privilege escalation routines.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Domain Groups
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has used the AD Explorer tool to enumerate groups on a victim's network.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Spearphishing Voice
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has called victims' help desk to convince the support personnel to reset a privileged account’s credentials.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

technique_table_data.name: Proxy
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has leverage NordVPN for its egress points when targeting intended victims.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Purchase Technical Data
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has purchased credentials and session tokens from criminal underground forums.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Code Repositories
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has searched public code repositories for exposed credentials.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

technique_table_data.name: Service Stop
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has shut down virtual machines from within a victim's on-premise VMware ESXi infrastructure.(Citation: NCC Group LAPSUS Apr 2022)

technique_table_data.name: SIM Card Swap
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has used SIM swapping to gain access to victims’ mobile devices.(Citation: Krebs LAPUSS Mar2022)(Citation: Microsoft DEV-0537 Mar2022)

technique_table_data.name: Trusted Relationship
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has accessed internet-facing identity providers such as Azure Active Directory and Okta to target specific organizations.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

subtechniques.name: Chat Messages
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has targeted various collaboration tools like Slack, Teams, JIRA, Confluence, and others to hunt for exposed credentials to support privilege escalation and lateral movement.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

technique_table_data.name: User Execution
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has recruited target organization employees or contractors who provide credentials and approve an associated MFA prompt, or install remote management software onto a corporate workstation, allowing [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) to take control of an authenticated system.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

technique_table_data.name: Valid Accounts
technique_table_data.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has used compromised credentials and/or session tokens to gain access into a victim's VPN, VDI, RDP, and IAMs.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)(Citation: NCC Group LAPSUS Apr 2022)

subtechniques.name: Cloud Accounts
subtechniques.descr: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has used compromised credentials to access cloud assets within a target organization.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

BBC LAPSUS Apr 2022.description: BBC. (2022, April 1). LAPSUS: Two UK Teenagers Charged with Hacking for Gang. Retrieved June 9, 2022.

Microsoft Threat Actor Naming July 2023.description: Microsoft . (2023, July 12). How Microsoft names threat actors. Retrieved November 17, 2023.

MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022.description: MSTIC, DART, M365 Defender. (2022, March 24). DEV-0537 Criminal Actor Targeting Organizations for Data Exfiltration and Destruction. Retrieved May 17, 2022.

UNIT 42 LAPSUS Mar 2022.description: UNIT 42. (2022, March 24). Threat Brief: Lapsus$ Group. Retrieved May 17, 2022.

NCC Group LAPSUS Apr 2022.description: Brown, D., et al. (2022, April 28). LAPSUS$: Recent techniques, tactics and procedures. Retrieved December 22, 2022.

Krebs LAPUSS Mar2022.description: Krebs, B. (2022, March 23). A Closer Look at the LAPSUS$ Data Extortion Group. Retrieved January 27, 2025.

Microsoft DEV-0537 Mar2022.description: Microsoft Incident Response, Microsoft Threat Intelligence . (2022, March 22). DEV-0537 criminal actor targeting organizations for data exfiltration and destruction. Retrieved January 27, 2025.
